N = int(input())
i = N + 1
flag = 0
for i in range(N+1, 987654321):
    a = str(i)
    b = list(a)
    c = set(a)
    if '0' not in b:
        if len(b) == len(c):
            print(i)
            flag += 1
            break
    
if flag < 1:
    print(0)

n=int(input())+1
flag=0
while(n<=987654321):
    digits=[str(x) for x in str(n)]
    if '0' in digits:
        n+=1
        continue
    else:
        n+=1
        j=len(digits)
        s=len(list(set(digits)))
        if j==s:
            print(''.join(digits))
            flag=1
            break
if flag==0:
    print('0')
